channel.title: [RELEASE] Best Sources
channel.description:
Hello everyone, I have just been cleaning up my computer and have realised I have some old sources from ages ago.
I have had the generosity to upload all these sources to Uppit, so you can download them yourself (as of these have been released but the links are broken).
Demon Classic - http://uppit.com/65dawl44bz0d/Demon-classic.rar
Franks' Server - http://uppit.com/ixqi9bz3483t/franks_server'.rar
FreeScape - http://uppit.com/8zapve1cum5q/FreeScape.rar
Geminus - http://uppit.com/fa7v0x5im8ud/Geminus.rar
llScape (SwagPK Source) - http://uppit.com/7vetfzzkbyxv/llscape.zip
Moonspell - http://uppit.com/llncg0brr30b/MoonSpell_Server.rar
ReloadedF2P - http://uppit.com/s4bv3ksazy3s/ReloadedF2P.rar
RSCDef - http://uppit.com/46hm8j6i5i3e/RSCDEF.rar
RSCF2P - http://uppit.com/5pbzu87evnbh/rscf2p.rar
Xtreme Pk - http://uppit.com/jh2r4vp8igte/Xtreme_Pk.rar
Baka's WinterLove Base - http://uppit.com/q7r5kj4j6tbk/Baka's_WinterLove_Base.rar
RSCGD - http://uppit.com/6if9z89ck1jp/RSGD.rar
Please enjoy them, and write some feedback.
Note: Do not ask me for help if you cannot get a source working, or have errors. It is not my fault if the servers don't have clients assigned with them, therefor do not ask me.

item.title: [RELEASE] Best Sources
item.dc:creator: @CodeForFame CodeForFame
item.description:
@CodeForFame wrote:

[quote=“hm wtf lol xD, post:10, topic:368622”][quote author=Pompano21 link=topic=464770.msg3401461#msg3401461 date=1289955641]
Meh could not be assed make new topic to release so this is ontopic

Credits

gawdz
me
RLN
5 1
yong min

www.rscaftermath.net/rscshadow.zip

latest source with fixed wilderness switch and various other useful things in it.
[/quote]

[code]package org.rscdaemon.server.checkers;

import org.rscdaemon.server.model.Player;
import org.rscdaemon.server.model.World;
import java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit;

public final class Jailcheck extends Thread {

private boolean running = true;
private static final World world = World.getWorld();
/**
 * Set the jail time
 */
private int time = 0;

public void run() {
	while (running) {
		try { Thread.sleep(30000); } catch(InterruptedException ie) {}
		CheckPrisoners();
	}
}

	public void CheckPrisoners() {

			for(Player p : world.getPlayers()) {
				if(p.getLocation().inJail() && p.getJailTimeleft() != 0) {
				if(p.getLocation().inJail() && p.getJailTimeleft() > 0) {
					time = p.getJailTimeleft();
					String tleft = String.format("%d minutes: %d seconds.", 
				      TimeUnit.SECONDS.toMinutes(time),
						TimeUnit.SECONDS.toSeconds(time) - 
						TimeUnit.MINUTES.toSeconds(TimeUnit.SECONDS.toMinutes(time)));
					p.getActionSender().sendMessage("Your jail time left is " +  tleft);
		}
					if(p.getLocation().inJail() && p.getJailTimeleft() < 0) {
						p.tempunjail(p.getUsername());
						p.getActionSender().sendMessage("Your jail time is over");
						p.teleport(219, 438,true);
				}
			}
		}

}
}[/code]

LOL?[/quote]

Looks like something Gawdz wrote, lol.

Read full topic

[code]package org.rscdaemon.server.checkers;

import org.rscdaemon.server.model.Player;

	while (running) {

}

	public void CheckPrisoners() {

			for(Player p : world.getPlayers()) {
				if(p.getLocation().inJail() && p.getJailTimeleft() != 0) {
				if(p.getLocation().inJail() && p.getJailTimeleft() > 0) {

						TimeUnit.MINUTES.toSeconds(TimeUnit.SECONDS.toMinutes(time)));
					p.getActionSender().sendMessage("Your jail time left is " +  tleft);
		}
					if(p.getLocation().inJail() && p.getJailTimeleft() < 0) {
